articles.title: Kanye West suspended from Twitter after sharing image of swastika and praising Hitler - Sky News
articles.content:
Kanye West has been suspended from Twitter after he tweeted an image of a swastika, hours after he praised Hitler and made antisemitic jokes in an interview with the conspiracy theorist Alex Jones.

articles.title: Christine McVie used to play at the blues night we ran as teenagers. We were all besotted - The Guardian
articles.description: We’d book Chicken Shack in a room above a pub for £30. And in a male-dominated scene, the shy singer proved her worth with a magical voice

articles.title: Brad William Henke, star of Orange is the New Black, dies aged 56 - Sky News
articles.content:
Actor and former NFL player Brad William Henke has died at the age of 56, his family has said.
Henke passed away on 29 November in his sleep, and no cause of death was given.
